attributes.MarketingDescription: Just like Courtney’s PJs, this blue knee-length fleece night shirt has a 1980s Care Bears™ graphic on the front and lighter blue raglan contrast sleeves. Flame-resistant polyester. Imported. Blue. Sizes XS-XL

attributes.MarketingDescription: Just like Joss’s PJs! The side-tie pajama top has long sleeves and a “Shine Bright” graphic. PJs also include multicolored leggings. Flame-resistant polyester. Imported. Print. Sizes XS-XL

PLAgoogleprodcat: Apparel & Accessories > Clothing > Sleepwear & Loungewear > Pajamas
DisclaimerCopy: All Sales Final. No Returns or Exchanges.
CareInstructions: Fabric care: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low
Tab2ContentCSR: Care Instructions: Turn inside out, machine wash cold, delicate cycle. To retain Flame Resistance, use detergent. Do not use fabric softener. Do not use soap in hard water. Only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry, low. Cool iron as needed, do not iron on print.
PLAgoogleprodtype: Apparel > Sleepwear > Pajamas > Doll & Girl > Truly Me
MarketingDescription: Made to match her doll’s for s’more fun at sleepovers! The tunic-style pajama top features a glow-in-the-dark s’mores graphic. Leggings have an allover glow-in-the-dark campfire s’mores print. Flame-resistant polyester/spandex. Imported. Print. Sizes XS-XL
